modName: Magicka Regen Whilst In Combat Buff
summary: This tiny modification changes in combat regeneration to 2%(0.66 x 3) from 1%(0.33 x 3)
descriptionHtml:
In Vanilla you have a base Magicka Regen Rate of 3% while out of combat.

While in Combat it becomes 1(0.33 x 3)%, which means: 
If you have 100 Magicka it\'ll take 100 seconds to regenerate.
If you have 200 Magicka it\'ll take 50 seconds to regenerate.

Without potions your basically skrewed. This tiny modification changes in combat regeneration to 2%(0.66 x 3)
author: hideinlight
